card_name: Gold Pride - The Crowd Goes Wild!
card_text: Reveal 1 "Gold Pride" monster in your hand; add 1 "Gold Pride" monster with a different name from your Deck to your hand, then you can apply the following effect.$N‚óèSpecial Summon 1 "Gold Pride" monster from your hand, but lose LP equal to its original ATK.$NYou can only activate 1 "Gold Pride - The Crowd Goes Wild!" per turn.
